settings.title: THE LATIN TWIST
settings.text:
We are new, we are fresh, we are cool. Here we don't cheers, we TIM-TIM. We love good food, good drinks and good people. And we welcome all folks because we believe the good stuff are for everyone!

We are independent and we work with independents. Help us to support our amazing local producers!

settings.title: WE ARE SOCIAL
settings.description: Follow us for new stuff @timtim.uk
